name: Reese Witherspoon's "Election" Quiz / Test | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: What subject did Jim McAllister teach at Carver High School?
questions.explanation:
U.S. History

	Jim had taught this subject for 12 years at Carver.

questions.text: Which of the following actors played Paul Metzler?
questions.explanation:
Chris Klein.

	Chris Klein can also be seen in "American Pie" and "Here on Earth".

questions.text: What was Dave and Linda Novotny's son's name?
questions.explanation:
Darryl.

	It is only said a few times through the film.  Jim and Diane were his Godparents.

questions.text: What were the names of the three high school candidates that ran for the presidency?
questions.explanation:
Tracy, Paul, Tammy.

	Tracy thought that she had this election in the bag.  Mr. McAllister then began to meddle by asking Paul to run because he thought it would help get his confidence back after his skiing accident.  Tammy became jealous after her girlfriend Lisa began dating her brother so she decided to throw her hat into the ring as well.

questions.text: What was the name of the motel that Jim wanted to take Linda to?
questions.explanation:
American Family Inn.

	Jim took a chance one day and suggested that he take Linda to the motel so they could be alone, however she was offended.  Then one morning he came over to help her with a plumbing problem and she all of the sudden changed her mind.  However, she ended up feeling guilty and went to Diane and said that he had taken advantage of her.  Jim ended up staying at the same motel and in the same room that he had arranged to meet Linda in.

questions.text: Who confessed to tearing down the posters?
questions.explanation:
Tammy.

	This is a tricky question.  Tracy actually tore down the posters, but Tammy told Mr. McAllister that she did it, so she could get thrown out of school.  Tammy ended up attending the Immaculate Heart School.

questions.text: What color was the icing on Tracy's cupcakes?
questions.explanation:
pink and yellow.

	Tracy and her mother, Judith, had stayed up most of the night decorating the cupcakes that read "Pick Flick".

questions.text: After Mr. McAllister resigned from Carver High School what state did he move to?
questions.explanation:
New York.

	Mr. McAllister left Omaha and moved to New York City where he became a tour guide.  He took children on tours of a museum.

questions.text: How much was the rent in Mr. McAllister's new apartment?
questions.explanation:
$1550.

	If you watch the movie carefully, you will see the amount is shown on the screen when he is leaving for his job.

questions.text: What did Mr. McAllister throw at the limousine that he saw Tracy get into in Washington, D.C.?
questions.explanation:
A milkshake.

	When he was visiting Washington, D.C., he saw Tracy get into the limousine and all of the sudden all of his memories came rushing back.  He was so angry that he threw his shake and hit the back of the car.  Nobody saw him do it.
